name: Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel - Lady Hammerlock Pack
name_original: Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel - Lady Hammerlock Pack
description:
Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel - Lady Hammerlock Pack is an action, shooter and RPG game developed by 2K Australia. It was originally released in 2015. 2K Games published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel - Lady Hammerlock Pack on PC and PlayStation 3.
